title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, published on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) allowing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs/Chat/embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker with one command.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama’s REST API written in Rust.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as Generators or Chat generators in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies in chat.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server (Go) that forwards Slack messages to Ollama and streams answers back.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for private LLM tests.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community TypeScript-native npm package offering an alternative JS client with Promise & stream support.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.
